day1.title: Opening (and the Scav List)
day1.contactPerson: Arjun Maneesh Agarwal, Harshitha Mucherla, Vighnesh Sangle
day1.description: A rather unnecessary opening ceremony. Although, if you bear with it, you can get the scav list earlier than others.

day1.title: Balloon Battle Royale
day1.description: You've got a balloon on your back. All you have is a toothpick and your team's honour. THIS IS SPARTAAAAA

day1.title: Monologue Competition
day1.description: A prompt appears on the screen and you must keep speaking till we cut you off. Dramatic. Funny. SILLY.

day1.title: Chess Clock Jenga
day1.description: The game of dexterity (and hoping that it doesn't fall) along with a chess clock to put pressure.

day1.title: Anti-Thesis
day1.description: You will be given a random dissertation of a topic you know nothing about. Now go defend it!

day1.title: Convention DnD
day1.description: Ever wanted to try out DnD (or other TTRPGs)? This is your opportunity. There are DMs, adventures and pre-gens; all we need is your imagination.

day1.title: Badminton
day1.description: Grab a Partner and smash/slice your way to the top.

day1.title: Poetry Slam
day1.description: Spill your heart out and read your verses!

day2.title: Presentation Night
day2.description: Educate or entertain us with armed only with a presentation. No MATH, CS or PHYSICS allowed.

day2.title: Tetris
day2.description: 1 v 1 tetris, Be the last to survive and take home a prize. (No matchups will clash with tug of war)

day2.title: FIFA
day2.contactPerson: Kabir Singh, Naman Maheshwari, Tejas Sah, Neelabh Shome
day2.description: Full Esports style FIFA tournament with projectors and controllers. We may also have clueless commentators.

day2.title: Mock Court
day2.description: The Court is in Session. You will be given the case and testimonies and must make the argument (and objections). Part debate, part courtroom shenanigans and complete chaos.

day2.title: Relay II
day2.description: Just the finals of a classic relay race

day2.title: Cultural Night
day2.description: CMI kids let loose and show their hidden talents. Singing, Instruments, Dance, Drama among other talents.

day2.title: Poker Night
day2.description: Don't play the odds, play the man!

day3.title: Clash Royale
day3.description: Build your decks and fireball (or skelly swarm or zap or knight) your opponents! (no rounds clash with GeoGuesser)

day3.title: GeoGuesser
day3.description: Time to show how well traveled, well read or plain good at stalking you are in competitive GeoGuesser. (no rounds clash with Clash Royale)

day3.title: Murder Mystery Night
day3.description: Everyone gets a character and then someone dies. One of you put the body there and none of you can leave till we know who.

day3.title: Tug of War
day3.description: We've got a football field, a strong rope, and people who think they are strong. You do the math.

day3.title: Chiraayu's Board Game Evening
day3.description: Come play a selection of board games that have been hand picked to have the most satisfying and marvelous mechanics. Our board games night has a special focus on abstract strategy games albeit we also have many other genres of games. Come early as you can and play as many games as you can! There is no registration and you can leave whenever you'd like

day3.title: DJ Night
day3.description: One of CMI's only traditions. Get ready to dance, rave and overall not feel the legs next morning.

day4.title: Hand and Brain Chess
day4.description: Hand-and-brain is a chess variant where each color is played by two people. One of them (the "brain") announces one of the six pieces—king, queen, rook, bishop, knight, or pawn—and the other player (the "hand") moves any of the named piece on the board that has a legal move. The catch: the "brain" cannot tell the specific move they want to play or give any hint to help the "hand" to figure it out.

day4.title: 5 Minute Presentations
day4.description: You have 5 minutes to teach a topic and there are a lot of prizes for your effort.

day4.title: Quiz Night
day4.contactPerson: Arjun Maneesh Agarwal, Animikha Dutta Dhar
day4.description: Test your knowledge about our world, media, sports and everything else in teams of 3 in a pub quiz.

day4.title: Integration Bee
day4.contactPerson: Arjun Maneesh Agarwal, Piyush Kumar Jha
day4.description: Are you ready to put your calculus skills to the test? Join us for a buzzing good time filled with integrals, fun, and prizes

day4.title: Neel's Movie Club Film Festival
day4.description: The former dictator of the movie club presents a bunch of short films (w|h)e really liked.

day4.title: CMI vs IMSc Football
day4.description: A completely friendly match between sister institutes. Not that it will stop us from whooping their *&%'s.

day4.title: Jane Street's Estimathon
day4.description: 30 mins, 13 questions, 3 team mates. It is math brawl meets interview type problems. Also, we have Jane Street T-Shirts.

day4.title: Integration Bee Finals
day4.contactPerson: Arjun Maneesh Agarwal, Piyush Kumar Jha
day4.description: Master Integrators duke it out for the Integration Bee Santa Hat (amoung other prizes)

day4.title: Judgement Day
day4.description: The judges look at what the hunters have found, tally the scores and crown the champion.

day4.title: Closing Ceremony
day4.description: Another unnecessary event by the organizers.
